value: title: R Weekly 2020-12 OncoTree, {parzer}, Flatten the Curve
description: Weekly News in the R Community
This weekâ€™s release was curated by [Jon Calder](https://twitter.com/jonmcalder), with help from the RWeekly team members and contributors.
